# TalentLyt: AI-Powered Interview Intelligence

TalentLyt is a production-grade B2B enterprise platform that conducts AI-powered technical interviews using a Dual-Agent Architecture.

## Core Value Proposition
- **Maya (Interviewer Agent)**: Conducts natural, role-specific technical screens.
- **AI Governor (Auditor Agent)**: Monitors integrity, technical truth, and behavioral signals in real-time.
- **Truth in Hiring**: Eliminates cheating and bias through server-side cross-verification.

## Key Features
- **Technical Truth Bank**: RAG-based verification against 20,000+ patterns.
- **AI-Speak Detection**: Identifies robotic filler phrases and scripted responses.
- **Dynamic Latency Traps**: Detects micro-fluctuations indicative of external tool usage.
- **RAG Challenge Generation**: Hyper-personalized coding problems grounded in JD and Resume.

## Pricing Tiers
- **Starter**: $0 (5 interviews/mo)
- **Pro**: $99/mo (50 interviews/mo, 14-day trial)
- **Business**: $299/mo (200 interviews/mo, ATS integrations)
- **Enterprise**: Custom (Unlimited scale, on-premise)

## URLs
- Homepage: https://talentlyt.ai
- Pricing: https://talentlyt.ai/pricing
- Architecture: https://talentlyt.ai/#architecture
